other.summary: Analytically driven Data Science Intern, known for high productivity and efficient task completion. Possess deep knowledge in machine learning, statistical analysis, and data visualization. Excel in problem-solving, critical thinking, and communication, ensuring seamless integration of data insights into actionable business strategies.
education-and-training: Received a 5 on AP World History
Received a 5 on AP Computer Science A
Interlake Senior High School, Bellevue WA Expected in June 2027
other.accomplishments: For outstanding service during my time serving as a Counselor-in-Training with the Boy Scouts of America, I was able to apply for and receive the gold President's Volunteer Service Award. I also took AP Computer Science A, and received a 5 on my exam, which I believe indicates a certain level of proficiency with the Java Programming Language.
other.certifications: For completing the Inspirit AI Scholars Course, I received a certificate which "confirms fulfillment of the requirements to become an Artificial Intelligence Scholar", and for completing the Inspirit AI Ambassadors Program, I received certification that stated confirmation for the requirements to become an AI Ambassador, awarded to the best-performing high school student leaders globally.
other.ongoing-internship: I am also currently working as an intern with Dreamwave AI, in order to help them improve their efficiency in regards to image recognition and detection algorithms.
